pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simulation of Respondent Driven Samples // Simulate populations with desired properties and extract respondent driven samples. To better understand the usage of the package and the algorithm used, please refer to Perera, A., and Ramanayake, A. (2019) htt ps://www.aimr.tirdiconference.com/assets/images/portfolio/Confe rence-Proceeding-AIMR-19.pdf.
